definitions: in a manner that lacks interest or excitement

examples.text: ideals of global peace have been dully intoned

shortDefinitions: in manner that lacks interest or excitement

definitions: in a manner that lacks brightness or shine

examples.text: the silver tiles gleamed dully in the firelight

shortDefinitions: in manner that lacks brightness or shine

definitions: with an unclear or muffled sound

examples.text: the voice carried on the rain, echoing dully in the heavy air

definitions: (with reference to pain) not acutely; indistinctly
in a slow-witted or stupid manner

examples.text: I had dully walked into a trap
